name: time_series_endpoint
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currency_conversion_and_exchange_rates.
Tool description: Simple reliable API for current and historical foreign exchange (forex) currency rates.
API description: Retrieve historical rates between two specified dates.

`Maximum of 365 day time range`

start_date.description: The start date for the time series data in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

end_date.description: The end date for the time series data in `YYYY-MM-DD` format.

is_from.description: Three-letter currency code of the currency would would like to convert from. This currency will be converted into the code of the currency provided in the `to` parameter

to.description: A comma-separated list of target currency codes to convert to. Defaults to 'EUR,GBP'.
